description: McKay-Thompson series of class 18j for the Monster group.
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
mathematica: nmax = 80; QP = QPochhammer; A = x^2*O[x]^nmax; A = ((QP[A + x^3]*QP[A + x^18]^2*QP[A + x^27])/(QP[A + x^6]*QP[A + x^9]^2*QP[A + x^54]))^2/x; a[n_] := SeriesCoefficient[A + 1/A, n]; Table[a[n], {n, -1, nmax}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 14 2015, adapted from PARI *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, n==-1, A = x^2 * O(x^n); A = ((eta(x^3 + A) * eta(x^18 + A)^2 * eta(x^27 + A)) / (eta(x^6 + A) * eta(x^9 + A)^2 * eta(x^54 + A)))^2 / x; polcoeff( A + 1/A, n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Apr 20 2004 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
